document.full_text: more than 2.6 million pregnancies a year end in stillbirth, a tragedy which mostly hits women in poor countries and accounts for more deaths than aids and malaria combined, researchers said on wednesday.
document.title: stillbirth: a silent tragedy haunts the world's poor
lines_and_colors: more than 2.6 million pregnancies a year end in stillbirth, a tragedy which mostly hits women in poor countries and accounts for more deaths than aids and malaria combined, researchers said on wednesday.
